Package com.spotlight.track

Interface Summary
SLDBserviceSoap  
 

Class Summary
action The action class is used to instantiate action objects to remain persistent in the devices storage.
AddAction  
AddActionResponse  
LocalDataAccess LocalDataAccess is used by the Listener objects to store triggered events that occur in the system.
MyAppListener MyAppListener monitors and registers application based events.
MyCallListener MyCallListener monitors and registers call based events.
MyGPSListener MyGPSListener monitors and registers location based events.
MyMailListener MyMailListener monitors and registers e-mail based events.
MyServerUpload MyServerUpload establishes the connection to the server and facilitates in the routine delivery of triggered event data to the server
MyTextListener MyTextListener monitors and registers text message based events.
